law.catch_line: The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of:...
law.text:
The sales and use tax does not apply to a sale of:
a bus to a person who uses the bus only:
in the operation of the transportation system of a political subdivision of the State; and
for public transportation on regular schedules and between fixed termini, as defined in Title 11 of the Transportation Article; or
a transportation service.
